RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: TXTBS_TAX_REFUND_DETAIL.PARTICIPANT_REF_NO = TXTBS_TAX_REFUND_SUMMARY.PARTICIPANT_REF_NO AND TXTBS_TAX_REFUND_DETAIL.EVENT_SEQ_NO= TXTBS_TAX_REFUND_SUMMARY.EVENT_SEQ_NO AND TXTBS_TAX_REFUND_DETAIL.TAX_RULE = TXTBS_TAX_REFUND_SUMMARY.TAX_RULE

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT DISTINCT(A.COUNTERPARTY), A.CONTRACT_REF_NO,C.CUSTOMER_NAME1,B.LATEST_EVENT_SEQ_NO FROM LPTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER A, OLTBS_CONTRACT B,(SELECT CUSTOMER_NO CUSTOMER_NO,SHORT_NAME CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER)C, TXTBS_TXNRULE_DETAIL D WHERE A.BORROWER_CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? AND A.VERSION_NO = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_NO) FROM LPTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = B.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND NVL(A.ROUNDING_PARTICIPANT, 'N') <> 'Y' AND C.CUSTOMER_NO = A.COUNTERPARTY AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = D.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND D.STATUS = 'N' AND (NVL(DECODE(NVL(D.PAY_RECV_IND, 'P'),'P',D.AMOUNT, 'R', -1 * D.AMOUNT),0) - NVL(D.TAX_REFUND_AMOUNT,0) - NVL(D.REMITTANCE_AMOUNT,0)) >= 0
select CONTRACT_REF_NO from OLTBS_CONTRACT where branch=global.current_branch and module_code IN ('LB', 'FC') and contract_status IN ('A', 'L') AND product_Type IN ('L','F','C')
